casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

March 14, 2008

[Cite as 03/14/2008 Case Announcements, 2008-0hio-1106.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2008-0411. Cleveland Clinic Found. v. Levin.

Board of Tax Appeals, Nos. 2005-V-1726, 2006-V-99, and 2006-H-117. This cause is pending before the court as an appeal from the Board of Tax Appeals. Upon consideration of appellants’ motion to stay briefing on the motion to dismiss pending mediation,

It is ordered by the court that the motion is granted.
